shippingDetail.title: Shipping Details - {agent}
shippingDetail.description: Detailed breakdown of shipping costs and calculation method
shippingDetail.singleItemMethod: Shipping fee is based on the individual item's shipping cost provided by the agent.
shippingDetail.multiItemMethod: Shipping fee is calculated by summing individual item shipping costs. Actual shipping may vary based on package consolidation.
shippingDetail.noWeightWarning: Some items don't have weight information. Shipping estimate may be less accurate.
shippingDetail.disclaimer: Note: Shipping costs are estimates based on available information. Actual shipping fees may vary depending on package consolidation, customs, and other factors. Please confirm final shipping costs on the agent's website.

assistant.noSuggestionsDesc: Your item grouping is already the most economical combination. No adjustments needed.

cart.noChangesNeeded: Current assignment is already optimal, no changes needed
cart.optimizationFailed: Optimization failed, please try again later

footer.description: Your trusted product search and agent comparison platform. Discover, compare, and find the best deals.

hero.title: About Xfinds
hero.subtitle: Empowering smart shopping decisions through comprehensive product search and agent comparison

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To revolutionize online shopping by providing users with transparent, comprehensive, and reliable product information and agent comparisons, enabling informed purchasing decisions and exceptional shopping experiences.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Xfinds was founded with a simple yet powerful vision: to make online shopping easier, smarter, and more transparent. We recognized that consumers were struggling to navigate the complex landscape of product options, pricing variations, and agent services.
story.paragraph2: Our platform aggregates product information from multiple trusted agent services, providing users with comprehensive comparisons, detailed specifications, and transparent pricing. We believe that every shopper deserves access to accurate information and fair comparisons.
story.paragraph3: Today, Xfinds serves thousands of users worldwide, helping them discover products, compare prices, and make informed purchasing decisions. We continue to innovate and improve our platform to better serve our community.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We continuously innovate to provide cutting-edge features and improve user experience through technology.

userFirst.title: User First
userFirst.description: Our users are at the heart of everything we do. We prioritize their needs, feedback, and satisfaction.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: We believe in honest, transparent information and clear communication with our users and partners.

efficiency.title: Efficiency
efficiency.description: We streamline the shopping process, saving users time and effort in finding the best products and deals.

global.title: Global Reach
global.description: We serve users worldwide, breaking down barriers and making global products accessible to everyone.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for excellence in every aspect of our service, from data accuracy to user experience.

productSearch.title: Product Search
productSearch.description: Our powerful search engine helps you find products across multiple categories with advanced filtering and sorting options.

priceComparison.title: Price Comparison
priceComparison.description: Compare prices from different agent services to find the best deals and save money on your purchases.

agentDirectory.title: Agent Directory
agentDirectory.description: Browse and compare trusted agent services with ratings, reviews, and detailed service information.

smartTools.title: Smart Shopping Tools
smartTools.description: Use our intelligent cart optimization, comparison features, and personalized recommendations to enhance your shopping experience.

cta.title: Join Our Community
cta.description: Start discovering products, comparing prices, and making smarter shopping decisions today.

hero.title: Get in Touch
hero.subtitle: We're here to help. Reach out to us with any questions, feedback, or concerns.

email.title: General Support
email.description: For general inquiries, account issues, or product questions.

general.title: General Inquiries
general.description: For business inquiries, partnerships, or media requests.

support.title: Technical Support
support.description: For technical issues, bug reports, or feature requests.

security.title: Security & Privacy
security.description: For security concerns, privacy questions, or data protection inquiries.

hours.title: Support Hours
hours.note: All times are in UTC. We aim to respond within 24-48 hours during business days.

question1.title: How do I create an account?
question1.answer: Click on 'Register' in the navigation menu, provide your email and create a password. You'll receive a verification email to complete registration.

question2.title: Is Xfinds free to use?
question2.answer: Yes, Xfinds is completely free to use. We provide product search and comparison services at no cost to our users.

question3.title: How accurate is the pricing information?
question3.answer: We strive to provide accurate pricing information, but prices may vary. Always verify final prices on the agent's website before completing a purchase.

response.title: Response Time
response.description: We typically respond to inquiries within 24-48 hours during business days. For urgent matters, please mark your email as urgent.

feedback.title: Feedback & Suggestions
feedback.description: We value your feedback! If you have suggestions for improving our platform or have encountered any issues, please don't hesitate to reach out.

partnership.title: Partnerships & Business
partnership.description: Interested in partnering with Xfinds or have a business inquiry? Contact us at info@xfinds.com and we'll get back to you promptly.

404.heading: Page Not Found
